iti94:2.1: “Tatha tatha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya yatha yathassa upaparikkhato bahiddha cassa vinnanam avikkhittam avisatam ajjhattam asanthitam anupadaya na paritasseyya.
iti94:2.2: Bahiddha, bhikkhave, vinnane avikkhitte avisate sati ajjhattam asanthite anupadaya aparitassato ayatim jatijaramaranadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hoti”ti.
iti94:4.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
